hudify.messages.premium_required: Spotify Premium is required for this feature
hudify.midnightconfig.title: Hudify Config
hudify.midnightconfig.poll_rate.tooltip:
How often to refresh the variables, in milliseconds
WARNING: Too low a value can cause you to hit Spotify ratelimits!
hudify.midnightconfig.scrub_name.tooltip:
(currently implemented as a separate variable)
Remove stuff like "remastered" from the end of track titles
hudify.midnightconfig.truncate_length.to:
Truncate long variables after this many characters.
Applies to artists, albums, and track names.
Set to -1 to never truncate
hudify.midnightconfig.db.tooltip: Logs extra debug info. Very spammy
